article_title: Don't Repeal The Cadillac Plan Tax--Replace It

article_metadata.description: Beginning in 2018, high-cost, private sector health plans will be subject to a special levy, popularly known as the "Cadillac plan" tax. Under a provision of the Affordable Care Act, health plans must pay a tax equal to 40 percent of each employee’s health benefits to the extent they exceed [...]
article_metadata.author: John C. Goodman
